statusDetails.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://client.thegigmobility.com/login

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 400: Bad Request

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: https://client.thegigmobility.com/login
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/12.8.0 Chrome/106.0.5249.51 Electron/21.0.0 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-length": 129
}
Body: username=udebibor.favour%40thegiggroupng.com&Password=548f3c&client_id=X-GIG-ADMIN&client_secret=X-GIG-Secret&grant_type=password

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 400 - Bad Request
Headers: {
  "cache-control": "no-cache",
  "pragma": "no-cache",
  "content-type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8",
  "expires": "-1",
  "server": "Microsoft-IIS/10.0",
  "x-powered-by": "ASP.NET",
  "date": "Fri, 30 Jun 2023 16:57:02 GMT",
  "content-length": "98"
}
Body: {
  "error": "invalid_grant",
  "error_description": "Your password has expired and needs to be changed!"
}
